Description: Schedules to upgrade internet bandwidth for ECS instances.

triggerCron.Description: The cron expression, refer them here: https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/zh/faq-detail/64769.htm. The minimum interval is one minute.

triggerEndDate.Description: The end date of time trigger. Format: yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ssZ

instanceIds.Description: The ID list of ECS instances.

maxBandwidthIn.Description: The maximum public network bandwidth for in-direction.

maxBandwidthOut.Description: The maximum public network bandwidth for out-direction.

startHourMinute.Description: The start time of upgrade. Format: hh:mmZ

durationHour.Description: The number of hours that the bandwidth upgrade lasts.

maxErrors.Description: The maximum number of errors allowed during task execution.

OOSAssumeRole.Description: The RAM role to be assumed by OOS.

Tasks.Name: timerTrigger
Tasks.Description: Triggers a task as scheduled by specifying Cron expression.

Tasks.Name: modifyInstanceNetworkSpec
Tasks.Description: Modifies the temporary bandwidth of the instance with the specified parameters.
